law.history: Repealed 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 491, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 40, sec. 1. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 338, sec. 1. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 1. -- Repealed, reenacted, and amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 130, secs. 1, 2, and 3. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 61, sec. 4, effective March 24, 1948.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: State taxes on legal actions and appeals.
